column5: Headed to my pike fishing spot @ sunrise and got into a good batch of pike but no giants today. At my first spot I only got a couple of hammer handles so I moved to a different area and got into the fish right away. On many occasions they grabbed the bait on my tipup line as I was setting it. I even had a double on the tipup with one pike on each treble of my quick strike rig. Sorry about the quality of the pics as I was fishing solo today. Enjoy.  Some good ice.          The double!!    And my first tourney entry of this years IS tourney. All of my entries this year are dedicated to my friend Terry who lost his life in a moose/car collision just hours after my mom passed away. Friday October 14th was not a good day for me or my friends and family. FYI Terry is the fellow that accompanied me on my "Ice Road Fishers" NWT trophy laker quest in the spring of 2010.    Worst pic of the day award!!!!
Looks cold up there Dave    Nice collection of gators   Great way to start the new season
Nah, not cold at all. Only -17 with no wind. Didn't even use heater or put up the hut.
On man !!! That must be a blast, yanking those through a small hole in the ice !!! Thanks Dave.
Great pikes. Keep sending us these reports. Sorry about your mom and Terry
